original_text: For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.
korean_text: 무릇 있는 자는 받아 풍족하게 되고 없는 자는 그 있는 것까지 빼앗기리라

sentences.original_text: For whoever has will be given more
sentences.korean_translation: 가진 자는 더 많이 받을 것이니

sentences.original_text: and they will have an abundance
even what they have will be taken from them
